price: 72. Mpe okati na bino ezali na basusu akolekisa tango mpona kotikala na sima, mpe soki likama ezui bino na bitumba akoloba ete:Ya sôló, Allah asili kosala ngai malamu na ntina ete nazalaki na bango elongo te, mpo noki nalingaki nakufa na bitumba,
arabic: وَإِنَّ مِنكُمۡ لَمَن لَّيُبَطِّئَنَّ فَإِنۡ أَصَٰبَتۡكُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَالَ قَدۡ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيَّ إِذۡ لَمۡ أَكُن مَّعَهُمۡ شَهِيدٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
